Articles.Content:
Hi all, 

I've been going through KSP1 again from the beginning and one thing I noticed compared to my gameplay before is that not all contracts appear. As example I had explore Minmus contracts (land, orbit, flyby) in previous gameplays but 95% of what I have now as available contracts are tourists. Even when I deny them, another appears.

Any idea why this is?  Could it be because of mods? 90% are just visual, but I do have Scansat which also has contracts, never had this one before, so I decided to give it go.

 

Edited May 3, 2023 by Ferio
The game gives you more of the contract types that you do. Do more other types of contracts to shift what you're offered.

On 5/3/2023 at 3:24 PM, Vanamonde said:

The game gives you more of the contract types that you do.

Well dang guess it's time to stop accepting those "get a science scan from this area"

I hate those kinds
